rules_text:
Enchant nonplaneswalker, non-Aura permanent
Enchanted permanent is a 4/4 Elemental creature in addition to its other types. If this Aura is a token, enchanted permanent is 8/8 instead.
Conceive 0–{5}{G}{G}{G} [i]({5}{G}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a 0/0 colorless Elemental creature token, then create a token that's a copy of this card attached to it. Conceive only as a sorcery.)[/i]
